name: d0not let them
description:
Hello,

Controls: WASD - move, Left-Click - Shoot, R - reload, space - Jump, Left-Control- crouch, G - Grenade

I have big plans for this game. This is just a prototype, a foundation. I uploaded this becouse I want to have a place where I can update the game and someone can maybe download it and try it. 

I am not a really good programmer, so the development takes so much time. I have to watch a lot of tutorials just to figure out one thing. So the game is a bit bugged here and there, well alot.

There is my roadmap, I will try to keep it updated, for you and also for me to keep track of things that I want to do. https://trello.com/b/af6Wi1uE/d0not-let-them

Hope you enjoy
